proof_script:
lemma bernoulli'_odd_eq_0: "n \<noteq> 1 \<Longrightarrow> odd n \<Longrightarrow> bernoulli' n = 0"
unfolding bernoulli'_def
by (cases "n = 1" "n = 2" rule: linorder_cases) (auto simp: bernoulli_odd_eq_0)

by (cases "n = 1" "n = 2" rule: linorder_cases) (auto simp: bernoulli_odd_eq_0)
